snippet: Union Rags showed he had what it took for the Kentucky Derby in a win last August and a loss in November.
abstract: Joe Drape On Horse Racing column picks Union Rags to win the Kentucky Derby.
lead_paragraph: Union Rags showed he had what it took for the Kentucky Derby in a win last August and a loss in November.

headline.seo: Union Rags, Kentucky Derby Pick, Forged at Saratoga
headline.main: A Derby Pick, Made in the Rain at Saratoga
headline.print_headline: A Derby Pick, Forged In the Rain at Saratoga
